comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Other Bain/LOC photos taken at the Midsummer Day Festival of the girls of Washington Irving High School, on June, 23, 1911, in Bronx Park [corrected on some photos to Pelham Bay Park]: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163520196/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163519956/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162717579/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163516194/#] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162714589/in/photostream/] Story in The New York Times, June 24, 1911 [scrolling required]: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A02E1DA1E3EE2...
